competitors.name: Zendesk
competitors.notes: Major competitor with multi-channel support and workforce management

competitors.name: Salesforce
competitors.notes: Cloud-based CRM with Service Cloud offering

competitors.name: ServiceNow
competitors.notes: Primary competitor in enterprise ITSM and customer service

competitors.name: Zoho
competitors.notes: Comprehensive suite including CRM, helpdesk support tools

competitors.name: HubSpot Service Hub
competitors.notes: Customer service integrated with HubSpot CRM ecosystem

competitors.name: Help Scout
competitors.notes: User-friendly for SaaS and ecommerce businesses

context: By 2020, Freshworks had evolved from single-product company (Freshdesk) to multi-product suite. Named 'visionary' on 2020 Gartner Magic Quadrant for CRM Customer Engagement Center. Competitive landscape marked by AI-powered automation, omnichannel support, and integration capabilities.
